content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. My name is Ava, and I'm here to help set up an appointment for your home. What’s your name, please?
Thanks, Lisa! Could you please provide the address where you need electrical service?
Thank you! Let me check if you are within our service area.
I'm having trouble verifying your address in our system and can't confirm if you're in our service area right now. Let me get one of our team members to assist further. Thank you for your patience!
reason: Agent unable to verify service area. Awaiting human assistance.
